author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-AAT Holding To Buy Back Up To 2.4 Mln Shares
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - AAT HOLDING SA
* SAID ON TUESDAY THE COMPANY AND ITS UNIT POLON PLAN TO BUY BACK IN TOTAL UP TO 2.4 MILLION SHARES AT 23.00 ZLOTYS PER SHARE
* POLON WANTS TO BUY UP TO 1.6 MILLION SHARES AND AAT HOLDING WANTS TO BUY UP TO 797,536 OWN SHARES
* THE SHARES IN TOTAL REPRESENT 29.97 PERCENT OF THE COMPANYâ€˜S SHARE CAPITAL
* THE BIDS WILL BE ACCEPTED UNTIL MARCH 2 Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
